About

Barret Requisites Trading DWC LLC

A Dubai World Central registered company. We are a production facilitating company that caters to any production, design, event and consultancy requirements for the client.

We have a pool of production partner, they join hands with us as per the client requirement and budget. We strive to go the extra mile satisfy and deliver the best to our clients.

For us every job is crucial, be it big or small, we dont differentiate. We treat every job with the same attention and zest, and try to bring out the best.
